questions.question: What type of README enhancement is needed?
options: Add installation/setup instructions (composer require, PHP version requirements, basic usage)
Expand documentation with API reference, method examples, and advanced usage patterns
Restructure for better organization (badges, table of contents, sections for different user levels)

questions.question: Should the README link to or reference the example.php file?
options: Yes, add a section directing users to run `php example.php` for interactive examples
No, keep focusing only on PostHog's main documentation links
Add inline code examples extracted from example.php to the README

questions.question: What level of detail should the README target?
options: Quick start only (current level) - point to external docs
Intermediate - include common use cases, basic API examples
Comprehensive - include full API reference, configuration options, troubleshooting

answers.selectedOption: Add installation/setup instructions (composer require, PHP version requirements, basic usage)
Add inline code examples extracted from example.php to the README
Intermediate - include common use cases, basic API examples
